response.original_title: BanG Dream! RAISE-A-SUILEN 5th Live: Heaven and Earth
response.overview: Heaven and Earth is RAISE A SUILEN's fifth live concert.  Maeshima Ami and Itou Miku were the guest performers for first and second day, respectively.  It was held on July 13 and 14, 2019 at Kobe World Memorial Hall.  Recorded footage of the live is included in the Blu-ray edition of RAISE A SUILEN's 1st album, ERA.
response.title: BanG Dream! RAISE-A-SUILEN 5th Live: Heaven and Earth
